description: The practice, exposed by an opposition MP, has sparked uproar.
title: Ukraine: Dogs auctioned to pay owners' debts
title_page: Ukraine: Dogs auctioned to pay owners' debts - BBC News
maintext: "We really have to confiscate pets from their owners," Justice Minister Denis Malyuska told BBC Ukrainian. "Even though they are taken because of their former owners' insolvency, often it turns out for the best when pets have been badly treated."
